author: Drapersniper
description: To use this to the fullest ModLog and ExtendedModLog cogs should be enabled, Auto Kicks users upon joining if they fail to pass some checks
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg: This bot will save your server from impending doom; To use this to the fullest ModLog and ExtendedModLog cogs should be enabled.
name: Anti-Bot
short: Auto Kicks users upon joining if they fail to pass some checks
